thread.title: Lei Faith
thread.title_full: Otticanet recensione scritta da Lei Faith

author: Lei Faith
title: Lei Faith
text: I never write review, but I stumbled upon this site by mere luck and am elated that I did. I am one to pay full price for anything that I love, I prefer quality over quantity. I was skeptical at first, but since I've found this site, I have purchased at least 7 pairs of sunglasses if not more with them and will continue to do so. Just bought a pair last week. I het compliments all the time. I highly recommend this site. Fast delivery, great quality, the latest selections at almost half the price. Only downfall is returns. It costs more to ship and return items that don't fit well, so I've never returned a pair. I suggest trying them on in stores then check to see if they have them available. You won't be disappointed.
